title: Akuu Daisakusen Srungle (Macron One)
synopsis: In the year 2545, an experiment gone wrong puts test pilot David Jance through the center of the galaxy and into another universe, which ends up in the middle of life and death struggle against the armies of GRIP, led by Dark Star.
voices: ['Nojima, Akio', 'Hirano, Fumi', 'Gouri, Daisuke', 'Onoda, Eiichi', 'Tonguu, Kyouko', 'Masuoka, Hiroshi', 'Aomori, Shin', 'Tsuda, Eizou', 'Kurosu, Kaoru', 'Sugita, Ikuko']
staff: [['Kuriyama, Yoshihide', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Aikawa, Shou', ['Script']], ['Nitta, Ichirou', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Amano, Yoshitaka', ['Character Design']]]
